author: Eibe Frank and Mark Hall and Bernhard Pfahringer
title: Locally Weighted Naive Bayes
window: 3772 6.0 23 6 2 sonar 208 0.0 60 0 2 soybean 683 9.8 0 35 19 splice 3190 0.0 0 61 3 vehicle 846 0.0 18 0 4 vote 435 5.6 0 16 2 vowel 990 0.0 10 3 11 waveform 5000 0.0 40 0 3 zoo 101 0.0 1 15 7 19 datasets for k = 5 and k = 10 respectively. When distance weighting is used with k-nearest neighbours, our method is significantly more accurate on 13 and 17 datasets for k = 5 and k = 10 respectively.
